While you're here... :D

Would you like to add another section describing their interplay? I have to go look it up and/or test it every time.

i.e. when the Android/iOS home bar (padding) and the keyboard (inset) are on top of each other, does the inset include the padding, is the padding just zero, does the inset only count the area on top of the padding etc etc. I can never remember since we didn't write it down.

Might be worth saying too: if you make a custom widget and it consumes a padding/inset, you're responsible to make sure your child doesn't see it anymore. Otherwise, your child might decide to be funky.
